summary: Four friends fight against a corrupt police officer who extorts money from them for not framing them in a murder which the officer committed himself.
cast: Jimmy Sheirgill|Mohit Marwah|Kiara Advani|Vijender Singh|Arfi Lamba|Anshuman Jha|Kunickaa Sadanand|Sana Saeed|Rajveer Ahuja|Mansha Bahl|Karim Hajee|Rahul Handa|Dimple Kapadia|Vidushi Mehra|Kunal Narula|Girish Pal|Sparsh Sharma|Aradhya Taing
title: Fugly
